segments.text: I see a woman standing in front of the sink, her focus entirely on the plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is flowing over the edge of the sink, pooling at her feet, but she seems blissfully unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how the chaos of the overflowing sink doesn’t faze her at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder how long this has been going on without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of running water fills the room, a continuous reminder of her negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she’s in her own little world, completely absorbed in the task at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the two children are plotting mischief just a few feet away from her.
segments.speaker: PAR
